channel.title: 彭博-市场
channel.description: 这是一个追踪彭博-市场news的种子

item.title: 全球最大的电池制造商 CATL 正在为特斯拉开发充电速度更快的电池，因为埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的汽车制造商正努力捍卫其市场份额，并推出售价低于 25,000 美元的电动汽车。
item.description:
The world’s biggest battery maker CATL is working on faster charging batteries for Tesla as Elon Musk’s automaker seeks to defend its market share and roll out an electric car for under $25,000 https://t.co/H3zNn0hQWA

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 25, 2024

item.title: 俄罗斯当局播放了四名男子在法庭上被控实施莫斯科音乐厅致命袭击的录像，经过审讯，他们的籍贯被追溯到塔吉克斯坦
item.description:
Russian authorities showed footage of four men charged in court with carrying out the deadly Moscow concert hall attack after interrogations that traced their origins to Tajikistan https://t.co/PrbWRrT6bo

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 25, 2024

item.title: 美国副总统卡马拉-哈里斯（Kamala Harris）拒绝排除以色列入侵拉法（美国曾多次警告以色列不要入侵拉法）的后果。
item.description:
Vice President Kamala Harris declined to rule out consequences for Israel if it invades Rafah, a step the US has repeatedly warned against https://t.co/P643G0gFpu

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 25, 2024

item.title: 紫金矿业是中国收购能力最强的矿业集团之一，该公司警告说，美国主导的应对中国政府控制矿产的努力可能会减缓该公司的全球扩张。
item.description:
Zijin Mining, one of China’s most acquisitive mining groups, warned that US-led efforts to tackle Beijing’s control of minerals could slow the company’s global expansion. https://t.co/p0pRU2tzF3

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 25, 2024

item.title: 赞比亚和津巴布韦正在重新招标一个耗资 50 亿美元的水电站建设项目，该项目之前由通用电气公司和中国电力建设集团公司中标。
item.description:
Zambia and Zimbabwe are retendering a $5 billion project to build a hydropower plant they previously awarded to GE and Power Construction Corp. of China https://t.co/5lRLgB6USm

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 25, 2024

item.title: @PaulJDavies 写道：即使在 Reddit 和 Astera Labs 首次公开募股之后，大多数独角兽上市的可能性也和找到一匹神奇的角马差不多。
item.description:
Even after Reddit and Astera Labs' IPOs, the chance of most unicorns getting to market is about as likely as finding a magical horned horse, writes @PaulJDavies https://t.co/GDXlkowr1r

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 25, 2024

item.title: 对于开罗的许多人来说，一个庞大的国际援助计划暴露了这个最大的阿拉伯国家已经沦落到何种地步
item.description:

item.title: 日本制药商小林制药（Kobayashi Pharmaceutical）在宣布因用户投诉肾脏问题而召回补充剂药丸后，其股价将跌至日跌幅上限
item.description:
Shares of Japanese drugmaker Kobayashi Pharmaceutical were set to fall by the daily limit after announcing a recall of supplement pills following complaints of kidney issues by users https://t.co/LAxY0RQRXK

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 25, 2024

item.title: 埃克森美孚在签署向日本最大的电力供应商出售低碳燃料的协议后，力促利用天然气生产的氢气获得美国的税收减免优惠
item.description:
Exxon Mobil pressed the case for hydrogen produced from natural gas to receive US tax credits after signing an accord to sell the low-carbon fuel to Japan’s biggest power provider https://t.co/9tscH1BRrW

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 25, 2024

item.title: 苹果公司首席执行官蒂姆-库克（Tim Cook）在北京中国发展高层论坛气候变化对话上表示，人工智能是帮助企业减少碳足迹的重要工具。
item.description:
Apple CEO Tim Cook says artificial intelligence is an essential tool for helping businesses reduce their carbon footprint, during a climate change dialog at the China Development Forum in Beijing https://t.co/xX74U2xB33 pic.twitter.com/DksSrfYmfI

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 25, 2024

item.title: 铁矿石保持了六个月来的最大单周涨幅，原因是人们对第一大消费国中国经济复苏的乐观情绪悄然升温
item.description:

item.title: 一位监管部门的高级官员表示，日本正在吸引更多外国资产管理公司的兴趣，这主要得益于政府将东京改造成一个主要金融中心的努力。
item.description:
Japan is attracting more interest from foreign asset managers, sparked by the government’s drive to remake Tokyo into a major financial hub, a top regulatory official said https://t.co/51Wn90ca4o

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 25, 2024

item.title: 香港取消房地产限制后，二手房市场在短暂反弹后逐渐降温，凸显了房地产行业面临的挑战
item.description:
Hong Kong’s secondhand home market is cooling down after a brief rebound following the city’s removal of property curbs, underscoring the property sector’s challenges https://t.co/689zZZ0mdg

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 25, 2024

item.title: 新消息：在香港，拥有中国专业知识的银行家曾一度备受追捧，如今他们正面临着黯淡的就业市场--并在重新评估自我价值。
item.description:
NEW: Bankers with Chinese expertise were once highly sought after in Hong Kong.

Now they're facing a bleak job market — and re-evaluating their self worth.

Read The Big Take ⬇ https://t.co/cCPadVCp5g
